questions.text: Why is username a good candidate to link profiles?
questions.correctAnswer: Username is public | Username is homogeneous

questions.text: Clustering coefficient is the measure of:
options: Tendency of nodes to form clusters
If a cluster is possible or not
questions.correctAnswer: Tendency of nodes to form clusters

questions.text: Which network among the following has the maximum clustering coefficient, as discussed in the lecture?
On anonymous networks we can see who liked a post?

options: Links to personal information given user ID

questions.text: How to link the profile of a user on Facebook to 4chan?
options: By searching for user name and doing a semantic matching
Comparing friends of a user on both the networks

questions.text: We can use the visualization software Gephi to get Modularity of a given graph?
Which of the following layout options is NOT available in Gephi ?

options: It gives quantitative measures that are otherwise impossible to find
To calculate the number of clusters
